WebLink.url:
{!URLFOR('/apex/dsfs__DocuSign_CreateEnvelope', null, [ SourceID = Contract.Id, DST = '2747d60b-80e7-4e7b-b839-4a210041f95d', CRL = 'Email~'+ Contract.Renewal_Order_Recipient_Email__c +';FirstName~;LastName~'+ Contract.Renewal_Order_Receipt_Name__c +';Role~Receipt Name;RoutingOrder~1', CES = 'MSP Customer Profile form', CEM = 'Honeywell has moved to an electronic signature format to execute its MSP renewal contracts. Please fully complete and sign the MSP Customer Profile form which is used to prepare your MSP renewal contract. There is an additional requirement to provide the name and email address of the person that will be signing the MSP renewal contract and MSP Addendum (if required) on behalf of the aircraft owner and/or operator. If you have any comments or questions, please feel free to contact us at 602.365.6442 or via email.

Please note that by completing and signing the MSP Customer Profile form you are not entering into an MSP contract, but rather providing information to Honeywell that will enable the proper person to review and electronically sign the MSP renewal contract.', LA = '0', LF = '0', OCO = '' ] )}
